quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
quotes.author: Beyoncé Knowles

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain
